column3: Lovely friendly welcome - beautiful house and garden and great breakfast provided. Very convenient for everything we wanted. A lovely host

Lovely friendly atmosphere, clean, fantastic breakfast.
Recommend
Water bed and was very comfortable. The range of foods available for breakfast as remarkable given the small number of guests staying there. The host was very friendly and spoke excellent English.
The beds were very comfy the owner was really nice and helpful the breakfast was good too
column4: Our room was a little tight but lovely over all :)
Only issue was advertised wifi didn't work in our room

column3: Magda was a wonderful hostess. Breakfast was fantastic! All that we wanted to see was easily walkable to.
Breakfast was great and the location was excellent
